# VZDiskImageCachingMode.automatic

**Case**

Allows the virtualization framework to automatically determine whether to enable data caching.

## Declaration

```swift
case automatic
```

## Disk image caching modes

- **VZDiskImageCachingMode.cached**: Enables data caching.
- **VZDiskImageCachingMode.uncached**: Disables data caching.
title: VZDiskImageCachingMode.automatic
